mapper.select: select * from tb_center, tb_shared_space where tb_center.center_id=tb_shared_space.center_id and tb_center.center_name=#{center_name} and tb_center.local_do like '%'||#{local_do}||'%'
select * from tb_center where local_do like '%'||#{local_do}||'%'
select * from tb_center a, tb_center_facility b where a.center_id=b.center_id and a.local_do like '%'||#{local_do}||'%' and b.fac_code=#{fac_code} and b.fac_cnt>=1

select c.center_name, b.RESERV_SEQ, b.USER_ID, b.SHARED_SPACE_SEQ, b.RESERV_DATE, b.USE_TIME, a.SHARED_SPACE_NAME, b.apply_date from tb_shared_space a, tb_reservation b,tb_center c where a.SHARED_SPACE_SEQ = b.SHARED_SPACE_SEQ and a. center_id = c.center_id and b.user_id=#{user_id} order by apply_date desc

select a.center_id, b.center_name, a.shared_space_seq, a.shared_space_name, b.center_weekday, b.center_weekend from tb_shared_space a, tb_center b where a.center_id = b.center_id and a.shared_space_seq=#{shared_space_seq}
select a.center_id, a.center_name, b.center_fac_seqc, b.fac_code, b.fac_cnt from tb_center a, tb_center_facility b where a.center_id=b.center_id and a.center_id=#{center_id}
